name: distribute_royalty
attributes: # [doc = " NFT の二次販売時にロイヤリティを分配するが、"]
# [doc = " royalty_info.owner と ctx.accounts.seller.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let info = & mut ctx . accounts . royalty_info ;
let pct = ctx . accounts . config . royalty_percentage as u64 ;
let amount = sale_price . checked_mul (pct) . unwrap () . checked_div (100) . unwrap () ;
info . total_disbursed = info . total_disbursed . checked_add (amount) . unwrap () ;
* * ctx . accounts . royalty_wallet . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () += amount ;
* * ctx . accounts . seller . to_account_info () . lamports . borrow_mut () -= amount ;

fields.name: royalty_info
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を付与して売り手照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: royalty_wallet
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ロイヤリティ受取用ウォレット"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: seller
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT を売却した売り手（署名者）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: config
fields.attribute: # [doc = " ロイヤリティ率を保持する設定アカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 本来このロイヤリティ情報を所有するべきアカウント"]

fields.name: total_disbursed
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでに分配された合計ロイヤリティ（Lamports）"]

fields.name: royalty_percentage
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 二次販売時のロイヤリティ率（パーセンテージ、0〜100）"]
